title: Starting an Amazon FBA Business
description: A 4-week self-learning plan to start an Amazon FBA business from scratch.

weeks.title: Introduction to Amazon FBA
learningObjectives: Understand the Amazon FBA business model
Learn about product research and selection
Familiarize with Amazon seller account setup
resources: Product Research Strategies for Amazon FBA

weeks.title: Sourcing and Supplier Selection
learningObjectives: Learn how to find reliable suppliers
Understand the process of negotiating with suppliers
weeklyTasks: Negotiate pricing and minimum order quantities

weeks.title: Inventory Management and Shipping
learningObjectives: Learn about shipping and logistics for Amazon FBA
Familiarize with Amazon advertising and marketing
topicsToCover: Shipping and logistics for Amazon FBA
weeklyTasks: Set up inventory management in Amazon Seller Central
Arrange for product shipment to Amazon fulfillment centers
Develop an Amazon advertising and marketing plan
resources: Amazon FBA Inventory Management Best Practices
Shipping and Logistics for Amazon FBA Sellers

weeks.title: Scaling and Optimization
learningObjectives: Learn strategies for scaling an Amazon FBA business
Familiarize with Amazon seller tools and resources
weeklyTasks: Develop a plan for scaling your Amazon FBA business
Review and optimize your seller performance metrics
Explore and utilize Amazon seller tools and resources
resources: Strategies for Scaling an Amazon FBA Business
Amazon Seller Performance Metrics and Optimization
Top Amazon Seller Tools and Resources
